title: PassionateEye - Should I Give Up Flying (CBC TVrip)
description:
The world loves to fly. Last year, British airports alone handled more than 200 million passengers and predictions indicate that this number will double over the next 15 years. Our love affair with flying has a staggering environmental cost. The aviation industry currently accounts for approximately 4% of greenhouse gases and scientists believe it will increase to over 60% by the year 2050.

Should I Really Give Up Flying? offers a comprehensive look at air tourism and its impact on the  environment, including the latest in aviation and fuel advances designed to make flying more eco-friendly.

Presenters Ginny Buckley and Max Flint reveal the effects of climate change on some of the world&#039;s favourite destinations - from the beautiful city of Venice, now vulnerable to rising sea levels, to the prolonged drought and soaring temperatures in Spain. They also explore the impact that budget airlines could have on the environment and talk with two entrepreneurs keen to corner the huge Indian middle-class market for cheap flights.
